Considering this was made by Uwe Boll, this was quite good actually. The acting does seem a bite nervous and stressed out, but I'm betting Uwe is like a with ADHD on the set, so he might be freaking his actors out :D Interesting little flick.

The ripper failed to do a proper inverse telecine, so you get every 4th frame twice, giving you stuttering, although it's not as distracting as you'd think.

Good rip .. as for the "every 4th frame" comment - most of the movie is done in hand cams - so not really noticable. But takes a good eye to pick it up. I guess.
